Genetic data. BIN : BOLD :AAC5991 (n=6 from Ethiopia , n=15 from Tanzania , Kenya , Yemen ; maximum variation 1.5%). Nearest species:
Z. metallicata
(7.0%).
Distribution. Algeria , Egypt , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Kenya , Niger , Saudi Arabia , Somalia , Sudan , Tanzania , Yemen ( Fletcher 1974 ; Speidel & Hassler 1989 ).
